problem_names:
lemma congBisim:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<sim> Q"

lemma eqClosed:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   perm :: "name prm"

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "(perm \<bullet> P) \<sim>\<^sup>s (perm \<bullet> Q)"

lemma reflexive:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s P"

lemma symmetric:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"
  
  shows "Q \<sim>\<^sup>s P"

lemma transitive:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"
  and     "Q \<sim>\<^sup>s R"
  
  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s R"
translations:
lemma congBisim:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "P \<sim> Q"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q
  substClosed ?Rel \<subseteq> ?Rel

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<sim> Q

lemma eqClosed:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   perm :: "name prm"

  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"

  shows "(perm \<bullet> P) \<sim>\<^sup>s (perm \<bullet> Q)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. perm \<bullet> P \<sim>\<^sup>s perm \<bullet> Q

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. perm \<bullet> P \<sim>\<^sup>s perm \<bullet> Q

lemma reflexive:
  fixes P :: pi
  
  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s P"
by(force simp add: substClosed_def intro: Strong_Late_Bisim.reflexive)

lemma symmetric:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"
  
  shows "Q \<sim>\<^sup>s P"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. Q \<sim>\<^sup>s P
by(force simp add: substClosed_def intro: Strong_Late_Bisim.symmetric)

lemma transitive:
  fixes P :: pi
  and   Q :: pi
  and   R :: pi
  
  assumes "P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q"
  and     "Q \<sim>\<^sup>s R"
  
  shows "P \<sim>\<^sup>s R"

proof (prove)
using this:
  P \<sim>\<^sup>s Q
  Q \<sim>\<^sup>s R

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. P \<sim>\<^sup>s R
by(force simp add: substClosed_def intro: Strong_Late_Bisim.transitive)
